about.headline: About me
about.text1: Hi, I'm Sebastian Torney, a Frontend Developer from Bergwitz. Through working on numerous projects, I have acquired the skills to program both static websites and complex business applications
about.text2: I love engaging with new technologies and learning about them. As a developer, I can now integrate this passion into my daily professional life.t
about.text3: Below, is an overview of my skills and some projects where I have applied them. I am pleased that you have found your way to my site.

skills.headline: My skills
skills.text: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.

projects.text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
projects.project1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.project2: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on a object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and bottles to fight against the killer chicken.

contact.headline: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text1: Contact me through this form. I am looking forward to hearing from you, knowing your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.err-email: Please enter a valid email address
contact.err-msg: Please enter a message with at least 10 letters
contact.pri-pol3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
